ResourceHeader.Description: Linares (LRES) Magnetometer Station is located in Linares, Mexico.  It is one of the nine magnetometers of the Mid-continent MAgnetoseismic Chain (McMAC).
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: The operation of the Linares fluxgate magnetometer is managed by Universidad Autonoma de Nuevo Leon and UNAM-Juriquilla.

InformationURL.Name: McMAC Linares Station
InformationURL.Description: Information about the McMAC Linares Ground Magnetometer Station
